alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason; Peoria; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:03PM CDT until July 05 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fulton County in west central Illinois... West central Tazewell County in central Illinois... Northeastern Mason County in central Illinois... South central Peoria County in central Illinois... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 303 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of St. David, or 10 miles southeast of Canton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Manito around 315 PM CDT. Glasford around 320 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
